Items.Name: Mat
Items.LookDescription: A rubber mat with the words 'Welcome to Zork!' written on it lies here.

Items.Name: Mailbox
Items.LookDescription: There is a small mailbox here.

Items.Name: Sword
Items.LookDescription: An Elvish sword of great antiquity lies here.

Items.Name: Egg
Items.LookDescription: A jewel encrusted egg lies here.

Items.Name: Leaves
Items.LookDescription: There is a small pile of leaves here.

Items.Name: Zork
Items.LookDescription: A disk with the game Zork lies here.

Items.Name: Diamond
Items.LookDescription: A small, but shiny diamond lies here.

Items.Name: Bell
Items.LookDescription: There is a brass bell here.

Items.Name: Candles
Items.LookDescription: There is a set of melted candles here.

Items.Name: Skull
Items.LookDescription: There is a crystal skull here.

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south.
